verses.verse: הֵ֥ן <WH2005> Behold לְצֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> in righteousness יִמְלָךְ־ <WH4427> shall reign מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> Behold a king וּלְשָׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> and princes לְמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> in judgment יָשֹֽׂרוּ׃ <WH8323> shall rule

וְהָיָה־ <WH1961> become אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> And a man כְּמַֽחֲבֵא־ <WH4224> shall be as an hiding place ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> from the wind וְסֵ֣תֶר <WH5643> and a covert זָ֑רֶם <WH2230> from the tempest כְּפַלְגֵי־ <WH6388> as rivers מַ֣יִם <WH4325> of water בְּצָי֔וֹן <WH6724> in a dry place כְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> as the shadow סֶֽלַע־ <WH5553> rock כָּבֵ֖ד <WH3515> of a great בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> land עֲיֵפָֽה׃ <WH5889> in a weary

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִשְׁעֶ֖ינָה <WH8159> shall not be dim עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> And the eyes רֹאִ֑ים <WH7200> of them that see וְאָזְנֵ֥י <WH241> and the ears שֹׁמְעִ֖ים <WH8085> of them that hear תִּקְשַֽׁבְנָה׃ <WH7181> shall hearken

וּלְבַ֥ב <WH3824> The heart נִמְהָרִ֖ים <WH4116> also of the rash יָבִ֣ין <WH995> shall understand לָדָ֑עַת <WH3045> acknowledge וּלְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> and the tongue עִלְּגִ֔ים <WH5926> of the stammerers תְּמַהֵ֖ר <WH4116> shall be ready לְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> to speak צָחֽוֹת׃ <WH6703> plainly

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No יִקָּרֵ֥א <WH7121> shall be no more called ע֛וֹד <WH5750> longer לְנָבָ֖ל <WH5036> The vile person נָדִ֑יב <WH5081> liberal וּלְכִילַ֕י <WH3596> nor the churl לֹ֥א <WH3808> No יֵֽאָמֵ֖ר <WH559> said שֽׁוֹעַ׃ <WH7771> [to be] bountiful

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For נָבָל֙ <WH5036> For the vile person נְבָלָ֣ה <WH5039> villany יְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> will speak וְלִבּ֖וֹ <WH3820> and his heart יַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> will work אָ֑וֶן <WH205> iniquity לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to practise חֹ֗נֶף <WH2612> hypocrisy וּלְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> and to utter אֶל־ <WH413> against יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God תּוֹעָ֔ה <WH8442> error לְהָרִיק֙ <WH7324> to make empty נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> the soul רָעֵ֔ב <WH7457> of the hungry וּמַשְׁקֶ֥ה <WH4945> and he will cause the drink צָמֵ֖א <WH6771> of the thirsty יַחְסִֽיר׃ <WH2637> to fail

וְכֵלַ֖י <WH3596> also of the churl כֵּלָ֣יו <WH3627> The instruments רָעִ֑ים <WH7451> [are] evil ה֚וּא <WH1931> he זִמּ֣וֹת <WH2154> wicked devices יָעָ֔ץ <WH3289> he deviseth לְחַבֵּ֤ל <WH2254> to destroy [עֲנָוִים כ] (עֲנִיִּים֙ <WH6035> humble ק) בְּאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> words שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> with lying וּבְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> speaketh אֶבְי֖וֹן <WH34> even when the needy מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> right

וְנָדִ֖יב <WH5081> But the liberal נְדִיב֣וֹת <WH5081> liberal things יָעָ֑ץ <WH3289> deviseth וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> and נְדִיב֥וֹת <WH5081> and by liberal things יָקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> shall he stand פ

נָשִׁים֙ <WH802> ye women שַֽׁאֲנַנּ֔וֹת <WH7600> that are at ease קֹ֖מְנָה <WH6965> Rise up שְׁמַ֣עְנָה <WH8085> hear קוֹלִ֑י <WH6963> my voice בָּנוֹת֙ <WH1323> daughters בֹּֽטח֔וֹת <WH982> ye careless הַאְזֵ֖נָּה <WH238> give ear אִמְרָתִֽי׃ <WH565> unto my speech

יָמִים֙ <WH3117> Many days עַל־ <WH5921> Within שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> and years תִּרְגַּ֖זְנָה <WH7264> shall ye be troubled בֹּֽטְח֑וֹת <WH982> ye careless women כִּ֚י <WH3588> for כָּלָ֣ה <WH3615> shall fail בָצִ֔יר <WH1210> for the vintage אֹ֖סֶף <WH625> the gathering בְּלִ֥י <WH1097> will not יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> shall not come

חִרְדוּ֙ <WH2729> Tremble שַֽׁאֲנַנּ֔וֹת <WH7600> ye women that are at ease רְגָ֖זָה <WH7264> be troubled בֹּֽטְח֑וֹת <WH982> ye careless ones פְּשֹׁ֣טָֽה <WH6584> strip וְעֹ֔רָה <WH6209> you and make you bare וַחֲג֖וֹרָה <WH2296> and put עַל־ <WH5921> and חֲלָצָֽיִם׃ <WH2504> [sackcloth] upon [your] loins

עַל־ <WH5921> and שָׁדַ֖יִם <WH7699> for the teats סֹֽפְדִ֑ים <WH5594> They shall lament עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂדֵי־ <WH7704> fields חֶ֕מֶד <WH2531> for the pleasant עַל־ <WH5921> and גֶּ֖פֶן <WH1612> vine פֹּרִיָּֽה׃ <WH6509> for the fruitful

עַ֚ל <WH5921> For אַדְמַ֣ת <WH127> Upon the land עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> of my people ק֥וֹץ <WH6975> thorns שָׁמִ֖יר <WH8068> [and] briers תַּֽעֲלֶ֑ה <WH5927> shall come up כִּ֚י <WH3588> Yea עַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> for all בָּתֵּ֣י <WH1004> yea upon all the houses מָשׂ֔וֹשׂ <WH4885> of joy קִרְיָ֖ה <WH7151> city עַלִּיזָֽה׃ <WH5947> [in] the joyous

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because אַרְמ֣וֹן <WH759> Because the palaces נֻטָּ֔שׁ <WH5203> shall be forsaken הֲמ֥וֹן <WH1995> the multitude עִ֖יר <WH5892> of the city עֻזָּ֑ב <WH5800> shall be left עֹ֣פֶל <WH6076> the forts וָבַ֜חַן <WH975> and towers הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> have become בְעַ֤ד <WH1157> about מְעָרוֹת֙ <WH4631> shall be for dens עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> ever מְשׂ֥וֹשׂ <WH4885> a joy פְּרָאִ֖ים <WH6501> of wild asses מִרְעֵ֥ה <WH4829> a pasture עֲדָרִֽים׃ <WH5739> of flocks

עַד־ <WH5704> Until יֵ֨עָרֶ֥ה <WH6168> be poured עָלֵ֛ינוּ <WH5921> and ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> Until the spirit מִמָּר֑וֹם <WH4791> upon us from on high וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> becomes מִדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> and the wilderness לַכַּרְמֶ֔ל <WH3759> be a fruitful field [וְכַרְמֶל כ] (וְהַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <WH3759> A fertile ק) לַיַּ֥עַר <WH3293> for a forest יֵחָשֵֽׁב׃ <WH2803> be counted

וְשָׁכַ֥ן <WH7931> shall dwell בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> in the wilderness מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> Then judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> and righteousness בַּכַּרְמֶ֥ל <WH3759> in the fruitful field תֵּשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> remain

וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> become מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> And the work הַצְּדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> of righteousness שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> shall be peace וַֽעֲבֹדַת֙ <WH5656> and the effect הַצְּדָקָ֔ה <WH6666> of righteousness הַשְׁקֵ֥ט <WH8252> quietness וָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> and assurance עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

וְיָשַׁ֥ב <WH3427> shall dwell עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> And my people בִּנְוֵ֣ה <WH5116> habitation שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> in a peaceable וּֽבְמִשְׁכְּנוֹת֙ <WH4908> dwellings מִבְטַחִ֔ים <WH4009> and in sure וּבִמְנוּחֹ֖ת <WH4496> resting places שַׁאֲנַנּֽוֹת׃ <WH7600> and in quiet

וּבָרַ֖ד <WH1258> When it shall hail בְּרֶ֣דֶת <WH3381> coming down הַיָּ֑עַר <WH3293> on the forest וּבַשִּׁפְלָ֖ה <WH8218> in a low place תִּשְׁפַּ֥ל <WH8213> shall be low הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> and the city

אַשְׁרֵיכֶ֕ם <WH835> Blessed זֹרְעֵ֖י <WH2232> [are] ye that sow עַל־ <WH5921> beside כָּל־ <WH3605> all מָ֑יִם <WH4325> beside all waters מְשַׁלְּחֵ֥י <WH7971> that send forth רֶֽגֶל־ <WH7272> [thither] the feet הַשּׁ֖וֹר <WH7794> of the ox וְהַחֲמֽוֹר׃ <WH2543> and the ass ס
